DOC.brief_summary: This study compare efficacy low dose Ketamine versus Compazine control headache patient present Emergency Department .
DOC.brief_title: The CHECK Trial : A Comparison Headache Treatment ED : Compazine Versus Ketamine
DOC.detailed_description: After enrollment , patient randomize either standard treatment arm receive prochlorperazine 10 mg IV along diphenhydramine 25 mg IV , OR study arm receive Ketamine 0.3 mg/kg along ondansetron 4 mg IV . The diphenhydramine ondansetron administer first , immediately afterward prochlorperazine Ketamine administer . The prochlorperazine Ketamine dilute saline total volume 5 mL , administer 2 minute . The diphenhydramine dilute saline 2 mL ( volume ondansetron ) . Both group also receive 500 mL normal saline bolus study medication administer . The ED pharmacist responsible preparing medication , use double-blind protocol . He record arm patient randomize . Only pharmacist access randomization record reveal randomization end study . Emergency provider instruct administer rescue medication least 30 minute . The electronic medical record order read `` randomized study medication '' ( Ketamine prochlorperazine ) `` randomize add-on medication '' ( ondansetron diphenhydramine ) .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 65 year Temperature < 100.4Â° F Diastolic Blood Pressure < 104 mm Hg Normal neurological exam mormal mental status Pregnant breastfeeding . Meningeal sign present Acute angle closure glaucoma suspect . Head trauma within previous two week Lumbar puncture within previous two week Thunderclap onset headache Weight 150 kg less 40 kg . Known allergy one study drug . History schizophrenia bipolar disorder . History intracranial hypertension . Is prisoner Patient decline informed consent NonEnglish speaking patient . Attending provider excludes patient
